content.en: Image encryption advancements: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms for various aspects of image encryption. These algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and chaotic systems, are being attributed with the agency of image encryption, chaos-based image encryption, digital image encryption, robust and sensitive image encryption, efficient chaos-based image encryption, multiple-image encryption, resistance to common attacks, fine-grained control over encryption requirements, improved encryption performance, good speed and resistance to attacks, strong cryptographic behavior, and protection and privacy of multimedia data. These studies aim to enhance the security and efficiency of image encryption techniques.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for billedkryptering: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer til forskellige aspekter af billedkryptering. Disse algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og kaotiske systemer, tilskrives billedkrypteringens virkninger, kaosbaseret billedkryptering, digital billedkryptering, robust og følsom billedkryptering, effektiv kaosbaseret billedkryptering, kryptering af flere billeder, modstandsdygtighed over for almindelige angreb, finjusteret kontrol over krypteringskrav, forbedret krypteringsydelse, god hastighed og modstandsdygtighed over for angreb, stærk kryptografisk adfærd samt beskyttelse og privatliv af multimediedata. Disse undersøgelser sigter mod at forbedre sikkerheden og effektiviteten af billedkrypteringsteknikker.
